Websites

I've been building websites since 2023. I'm pretty happy with the progress I've made in a fairly short time, and I'm officially trying to establish a clientele.

I like building sites for individuals, small businesses, and nonprofits. If you need a developer in your life and that sounds like a good fit, send me an email.
